name: com.castsoftware.nosqldotnet
title: NoSQL for .Net
description: NoSQL support extension for .Net provides official support for MongoDB, DynamoDB, CosmosDB, Memcached, Couchbase, Redis and Elasticsearch. The calculation of Function Points using these NoSQL technologies will be improved through the creation of new objects and links specific to supported NoSQL technologies. The extension also provides new quality rules concerning the best practices and detections of risks related to the these NoSQL technologies.
